description:
Zoro is held against his will by the pink-haired princess of bad vibes, Brook gets mistaken for the king of darkness, and Luffy continues to eat his way toward a reunion with Fire-Fist Ace!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Des nouvelles de l`équipage. La Princesse Fantôme et le dieu du Mal
Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Negative Princess to Akuma Ou
The Friends` Whereabouts: A Negative Princess and the King of Demons
مواقع الأصدقاء! سلبيّة أميرة وملك الشّياطين!
仲間達の行方 ネガティブ王女[プリンセス]と悪魔王
